title: Dependencies required in local Python environment
body:
This will not run unless the Python dependencies are installed locally in the Python environment:

- poetry
- uvicorn
- fastapi
- sqlalchemy
- etc

The instructions should be updated.
author: ruze00

comments.body: Hi @ruze00 thanks for pointing this out. I created a fix in #69 which should automatically install all the dependencies in the `run.sh` script. Let me know if it works for you
